Package oop

Class Doctor

java.lang.Object
oop.UserLogic.Role
oop.HospitalStaff
oop.Doctor
public class Doctor extends HospitalStaff
Represents a Doctor in a hospital. The Doctor class extends the HospitalStaff class and provides functionality for managing a doctor's schedule, viewing and updating medical records of patients, and handling available time slots for appointments.
Since:
2024-11-09

  • Field Details

    • patients

      public ArrayList<Patient> patients
      The list of patients under the doctor's care.

      This list contains all the patients currently assigned to the doctor. The doctor can access and manage this list for various purposes, including viewing medical records and updating treatment plans.

    • formatter

      public DateTimeFormatter formatter
      Formatter used to display dates in the format "dd-MM-yyyy".

  • Constructor Details

    • Doctor

      public Doctor(String name, String doctorID, int age, Gender gender)
      Constructs a new Doctor object.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the doctor
      doctorID - the unique ID of the doctor
      age - the age of the doctor
      gender - the gender of the doctor

  • Method Details

    • generateDefaultTimeSlots

      public static ArrayList<TimeSlot> generateDefaultTimeSlots()
      Generates default time slots for the next two months, starting from the next day. Time slots are created for weekdays from 9 AM to 5 PM.
      Returns:
      a list of available time slots

    • getPendingAppointments

      public ArrayList<Appointment> getPendingAppointments()
      Returns the list of pending appointments for the doctor.
      Returns:
      the list of pending appointments

    • viewPatientMedicalRecord

      public void viewPatientMedicalRecord()
      Allows the doctor to view the medical record of a patient. The doctor selects a patient from the list and views their medical history.

    • updateMedicalRecord

      public void updateMedicalRecord()
      Allows the doctor to update the medical record of a patient. The doctor can add a new diagnosis or treatment plan.

    • viewPersonalSchedule

      public void viewPersonalSchedule()
      Allows the doctor to view their schedule for a specific day. The doctor is prompted to input a date, and the system outputs the schedule for that day.

    • setAvailability

      public void setAvailability()
      Allows the doctor to set their availability for appointments. The doctor can add or remove available time slots.

    • addAvailableSlots

      public void addAvailableSlots()
      Adds available timeslots to the schedule. This method prompts the doctor to enter a time slot, checks if each hourly interval from the start time to the end time is available, and then adds the valid ones to the available slots list. It also checks if the timeslot is already booked or pending in the schedule and prevents duplicates.

    • removeAvailableSlots

      public void removeAvailableSlots()
      Removes available timeslots from the schedule. This method prompts the doctor to enter a time slot, checks if each hourly interval from the start time to the end time exists in the available slots list, and removes the valid ones. It also checks if any of the timeslots are booked or pending, and prevents removal in those cases.

    • getTimeSlotInput

      public TimeSlot getTimeSlotInput()
      Prompts the user to input a time slot consisting of a date, start time, and end time. The method performs input validation for each field to ensure that the entered values are within a valid range (e.g., the date is in the future, the start and end times are within business hours).
      Returns:
      A TimeSlot object with the user-provided date, start, and end time.

    • getDateInput

      public LocalDate getDateInput()
      Prompts the user to input a date, ensuring the date is valid and in the future. The doctor is asked to input the year, month, and day, with validation for each. The method returns a valid LocalDate object if the input is correct.
      Returns:
      A valid LocalDate object representing the user-provided date.

    • viewAvailability

      public void viewAvailability(LocalDate date)
      Displays the available time slots for a specific date. This method retrieves the available time slots for the given date and sorts them by the start time. If no slots are available, it notifies the user.
      Parameters:
      date - The date for which the available slots are to be viewed.

    • getAvailability

      public TimeSlot[] getAvailability(LocalDate date)
      Retrieves the available time slots for a specific date and doctor. This method checks the available time slots for the given doctor on the specified date and returns them as an array of TimeSlot objects.
      Parameters:
      date - The date for which the availability is requested.
      Returns:
      An array of TimeSlot objects representing the available slots.

    • acceptAppointmentRequest

      public void acceptAppointmentRequest(int appointmentNumber)
      Accepts an appointment request by changing the status to "Confirmed" and moves it from the pending appointments list to the confirmed schedule.
      Parameters:
      appointmentNumber - The appointment number (index in pendingAppointments list) to accept.

    • declineAppointmentRequest

      public void declineAppointmentRequest(int appointmentNumber)
      Declines an appointment request by changing the status to "Cancelled", removes it from the pending appointments list, and adds its time slot back to the available slots.
      Parameters:
      appointmentNumber - The appointment number (index in pendingAppointments list) to decline.

    • deleteAvailableSlots

      public void deleteAvailableSlots(TimeSlot timeSlot)
      Removes the given time slot from the available time slots.
      Parameters:
      timeSlot - The time slot to be deleted from the available slots.

    • addPendingAppointment

      public void addPendingAppointment(Appointment appointment)
      Adds an appointment to the pending appointments list.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The appointment to add to the pending appointments.

    • deleteScheduleAppointment

      public void deleteScheduleAppointment(Appointment appointment)
      Removes an appointment from the confirmed schedule and adds its time slot back to available slots.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The appointment to remove from the schedule.

    • deletePendingAppointment

      public void deletePendingAppointment(Appointment appointment)
      Removes an appointment from the pending appointments list and adds its time slot back to available slots.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The appointment to remove from the pending appointments.

    • addTimeSlotToAvailableSlots

      public void addTimeSlotToAvailableSlots(Appointment appointment)
      Adds the time slot of the given appointment back to the list of available time slots and sorts the available slots.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The appointment whose time slots are to be added back to the available slots.

    • viewPendingAppointments

      public void viewPendingAppointments()
      Displays the list of pending appointments with their details (e.g., date, start time, and end time).

    • viewUpcomingAppointments

      public void viewUpcomingAppointments()
      Displays the upcoming confirmed appointments (for the next 2 months) with their details.

    • recordAppointmentOutcome

      public void recordAppointmentOutcome()
      Records the outcome of an appointment, including the service provided, medications prescribed, and consultation notes. It also updates the appointment status to "Completed".

    • acceptOrDeclineAppointmentRequest

      public void acceptOrDeclineAppointmentRequest()
      Allows the doctor to accept or decline a pending appointment request. It displays the list of pending appointments and prompts the user for their choice.

    • getPatients

      public void getPatients()
      Retrieves all patients associated with the doctor's confirmed and pending appointments, removing duplicates and sorting them by patient ID.

    • checkPendingAppointmentsAlert

      public void checkPendingAppointmentsAlert()
      Checks for pending appointment requests and displays an alert if any are present.
